properties.scriptMethodHeader: def apply(spark: SparkSession, in: DataFrame) : Script = {

expression.expression:
coalesce(
    trim(col("term_dt")),
    first_defined(
      adjustCenturyDateInCyyFormat(lpad(col("term_dt"), 7, "0").cast(StringType), lit("1900"), lit("CyyMMdd")),
      lit("INVALID")
    )
  )
